mapper.insert: insert into contact ( contactPosition, contactName, contactSex, contactPhone,contactQQ,contactEmail,customerID,contactDate) values ( #{contactPosition}, #{contactName}, #{contactSex}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactQQ}, #{contactEmail}, #{customerID}, #{contactDate})
mapper.update: update contact set contactName = #{contactName}, contactPosition = #{contactPosition}, contactSex = #{contactSex}, contactPhone = #{contactPhone}, contactQQ = #{contactQQ}, contactEmail = #{contactEmail}, contactDate = #{contactDate} where contactID = #{contactID}
mapper.select: select * from contact left join customer cus on contact.customerID = cus.customerID where ${sql} order by contactID
